sense.def: Illness Sign identical with she tai 舌胎 , tongue fur. SHLS 3: 傷寒，舌上生胎，不拘 滑白黃黑，俱用井水浸青布片，於舌上洗淨後，用生薑片子時時浸水刮 之，其胎自退 , “In the case of harm caused by cold there is fur-growth on the tongue . Regardless of whether it is smooth, white, yellow, or black, in all cases use well water in which a piece of blue cloth has been soaked and wash the surface of the tongue with it. Then take a slice of raw ginger and repeatedly dip it into water and wipe the [fur]. The fur will vanish as a result 』.
